com.jeremielc.renanime.titles

Class TitlesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jeremielc.renanime.titles.TitlesManager

  • public class TitlesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to manage titles. It allow to retrieve titles for each episodes and manage the length of provided list to fit with anime's episodes number.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TitlesManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> alignTitleNumber(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> titleList, int episodeNumber)
      Create a new List containing all titles in the previous list plus empty titles ("") so that the list length matches the number of episodes.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> retrieveTitleList(java.lang.String fullTitleString)
      Parse a string containing all the titles separated by semicolon and return a list of titles string formated.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public TitlesManager()

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveTitleList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> retrieveTitleList(java.lang.String fullTitleString)
        Parse a string containing all the titles separated by semicolon and return a list of titles string formated.
        Parameters:
        fullTitleString - A string in the form "title_1;title_2;..."
        Returns:
        A list of string containing all the provided titles.

      • alignTitleNumber

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> alignTitleNumber(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> titleList,
                                                              int episodeNumber)
        Create a new List containing all titles in the previous list plus empty titles ("") so that the list length matches the number of episodes.
        Parameters:
        titleList - The previous list with not enought titles.
        episodeNumber - The number of episodes (aka the number of selected files.
        Returns:
        A new List with empty titles where they were missing.
